name: Cruisetopia
overview:
Cruisetopia had a simple idea; to build an online travel agent dedicated to cruise holidays that not only provides exceptional value but takes the hassle out of finding the perfect cruise. Their research highlighted what they’d need to do to give you the best possible cruise search and booking experience:

Create the fastest cruise search possible. No ‘results in 30 seconds’ here. Strive to give every cruise accurate prices down to cabin grade level. Avoid ‘Call Us’ for prices at all costs. Provide plentiful photographs of the places you might visit on the cruise, rather than only photos of the ship (Coming Soon) Provide an easily searchable database of cruise related questions so you can get those quick queries answered instantly (Coming Soon) Allow many cruises to be booked simply and instantly online, and provide all the options and information you’d get if you were booking at a travel agent’s shop (Coming Soon) Provide YouTube and Google Earth videos of many cruises giving you the closest thing possible to actually being there

The people who founded Cruisetopia collectively have over 45 years of experience in software, IT and travel. When They met and combined their knowledge Cruisetopia was born.
